001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003public class FindException extends RuntimeException {
004  @java.io.Serial private static final long serialVersionUID = 1863359159669939232L;
005
006  public FindException(Class<?> type, String name) {
007    super("Could not find instance of " + type + " by name: " + name);
008  }
009
010  public FindException(String message) {
011    super(message);
012  }
013}
